page.title: 18 Leisure in our area.
page.content: For the many visitors to the area who cannot get a room in one of the hotels there is a caravan site at Purlands. For the outdoor type there are many bridle-paths,fishing and cycling. After these strenuous activities, you can get a pint from one of the many pubs. There are also barn dances in Bradford Peverell. Actually in Dorchester there is a Sports centre at Castlefield School with swimming,Judo, Aerobics, Badminton, Tennis, Five-A-Side Football and Table Tennis and in the summer there is a sports morning for the children.In Bradford Peverell there are Scouts for the boys and for the families, horse riding and fruit picking.
